brainly_data.question: A cross between two squash plants that produce yellow squash results in 124 offspring: 93 produce yellow squash and 31 produce green squash. What are the likely genotypes of the plants that were crossed
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: A cross between two squash plants that produce yellow squash results in 124 offspring: 93 produce yellow squash and 31 produce green squash. What are the likely genotypes of the plants that were crossed
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text:
It depends on the dominant gene .
So it’s Yellow.

all_answers.question: A cross between two squash plants that produce yellow squash results in 124 offspring: 93 produce yellow squash and 31 produce green squash. What are the likely genotypes of the plants that were crossed
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: It would be 50% for both so they would be Yy.
